ch.blinkenlights.android.vanilla

Class PlaybackActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • android.view.ContextThemeWrapper
          • android.app.Activity
            • ch.blinkenlights.android.vanilla.PlaybackActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.os.Handler.Callback, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnClickListener, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback, CoverView.Callback, TimelineCallback
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AudioPickerActivity, MiniPlaybackActivity, SlidingPlaybackActivity

    public abstract class PlaybackActivity
extends android.app.Activity
implements TimelineCallback, android.os.Handler.Callback, android.view.View.OnClickListener, CoverView.Callback
    Base activity for activities that contain playback controls. Handles communication with the PlaybackService and response to state and song changes.

      Call addToPlaylist with data from the playlisttask object.
      protected static int MSG_CREATE_PLAYLIST
      Same as MSG_ADD_TO_PLAYLIST but creates the new playlist on-the-fly (or overwrites an existing list)

      Removes a media object

      Notification that we changed some playlist members

      Call renamePlaylist with the results from a NewPlaylistDialog stored in obj.

      protected android.os.Handler mUiHandler
      A Handler running on the UI thread, in contrast with mHandler which runs on a worker thread.
